affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 性质, 状况

word_mean_info__list.difference: 多指一连串行动或行为的完成方式。
较庄重用词，除泛指各种行为外，还可用于指某种高尚或伟大的行为，故常译作“功绩，业绩”。
主要指行动的方式方法。
普通用词，着重行动的过程。
一般指具体的、短暂的或个别的行为，强调行为的完成及其效果。

bilingual.source: Say what performance you would like to recommend.
A clown paints his face before a performance.
bilingual.target: 小丑在表演前给自己化妆。

bilingual.source: Would you like to take part in a traditional performance?
They celebrated the harvest with a musical performance.
bilingual.target: 他们用音乐表演庆祝丰收。

bilingual.source: It is an example of a traditional performance art.
bilingual.target: 它是传统表演艺术的一个例子。

bilingual.source: Each of the contestants put on a wonderful performance.
bilingual.target: 每个参赛者都表演得非常精彩。

bilingual.source: Crowds of people turned out to watch the charity performance.
bilingual.target: 大批人群出来观看慈善表演。

bilingual.source: The pictures on these two pages show performance arts.
bilingual.target: 这两页上的图片展示了表演艺术。

bilingual.source: Record your performance by taking photos or shooting a video.
bilingual.target: 通过拍照或录像记录你的表演。

bilingual.source: Definitely the performance given by my favourite hip-hop artist!
bilingual.target: 当然是我最喜欢的嘻哈艺术家的表演！

list.abstract: Performance（英[pəˈfɔːməns]，美[pərˈfɔːrməns]），英语单词。做名词用，指演出、表演、履行等。英语短语有wonderful performance（精彩的表演），例句为Monica's successful performance brought everyone a great surprise.（莫妮卡成功的表演给大家带来了很大的惊喜。） 近义词有property（名词）、capability（名词）、enforcement（名词）等；复数为performances。

yingyinNormal.en: He surprised me a lot on this performance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他的表演惊艳到我了。

yingyinNormal.en: Fair enough, but in its essence, teaching is a performance art.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，但是从本质上来讲教书是一门表演艺术。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't need a ticket or tuxedo to explore this incredible performance venue.
yingyinNormal.zh: 您不需购买门票或盛装打扮，都可以探索这个令人赞叹的表演场馆。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, you'll notice each list also includes my costume and performance suggestions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 另外，你们会看到每首歌的旁边还有我对服装和表演方面的建议。

yingyinNormal.en: Tonight, our mermaids dedicate their performance to all the missing penguins around the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今晚，美人鱼们将为全世界失踪的企鹅倾情奉上表演。

yingyinNormal.en: So, Papa Rudy let me travel with his troupe. Of course, I never did any performance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 于是鲁迪爸爸让我跟着他的戏班巡回，当然，我始终没有上场表演。

yingyinNormal.en: We will always create some new story to let the performance more modern. More modern, yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们总是会编些新故事，使表演更有现代特点。是的，更现代。

yingyinNormal.en: The most revered of the mythical animals, its movement in the performance must demonstrate its power and dignity, and the longer it is, the more luck it will bring the community.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它是最神秘和令人敬畏的动物，表演中的每个动作都是在彰显自己的权力和尊严，舞龙越长，越是能给社区带来好运。

yingyinNormal.en: The application for specific performance is denied.
yingyinNormal.zh: 故对该合同特定条款的有效性应予否认。

yingyinNormal.en: Superheroes take performance enhancing chemicals? You bet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 超级英雄们使用禁药吗？那还用说。

yingyinNormal.en: This usually works. Well, performance issues, it's not uncommon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我从没失误过。发挥失常很难免，好了，别那么自责。

yingyinNormal.en: We would like to honor the pigs with a special performance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要为猪猪们献上一段特别的演出。

yingyinNormal.en: Quite the performance. I've never seen anyone mess up that badly. That helped.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你真是好样的，没见过有人捅出这么大的篓子，你帮了大忙。

yingyinNormal.en: The defendant failed to live up to various performance sections of the contract.
yingyinNormal.zh: 被告未能履行多项合同所约定的义务。

yingyinNormal.en: Excuse me, Your Honor. By denying petitioners' motion for specific performance...
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，法官阁下，法庭通过驳回申请人关于履行特定义务的动议。

yingyinNormal.en: My guess is, they're pushing you out because of performance. You don't do anything, Howard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想他们要你走是因为你的表现，你什么都不做，霍华德。

yingyinNormal.en: What? She was impressed with our performance in the games. She invited us to join next semester!
yingyinNormal.zh: 她很欣赏我们在惊吓杯的表现，她邀我们加入下学期。

yingyinNormal.en: No, you haven't. Come see for yourself. A special performance just for you. What do you say, Nana?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你就别吹了。嘘！去故地从游吧。我为你准备了一场专场演出，怎么样，奶奶？

yingyinNormal.en: Huge IQ, great performance in primary school. And it all went tits up. Drugs, petty crime, never had a job.
yingyinNormal.zh: 高智商，小学时表现极为出色，然后一落千丈。吸毒，小偷小摸，游手好闲。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, if he's center stage on this, he can't fault my performance, because we're sharing the stage together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果他在这个舞台的中央，他就不能挑我的刺，因为我们要共享这个舞台。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 表现; 业绩; 性能

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 执行者；演员；表演者；演奏者；演出者
n. 演出；表演；履行；执行；完成；表现；饰演；工作情况；言语行为；性能
v. 执行任务；完成...；实施行动；履行职责；演出；表演；（perform的现在分词）
v. 做得比…好；比…回报更高

word_family.mean: v. 执行；完成；实施；履行；演出；表演；工作；表现；运行

sense_info_list.zh: 表现; 业绩; 性能

examination_example.sentence: Use of their gut hurt their <highlight>performance</highlight> on the first four tasks, as expected, and helped them on the rest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如预期的那样，使用他们的直觉会影响他们在前四项任务中的表现，但却会帮助他们完成余下的任务。

examination_example.sentence: In its latest survey of CEO pay, The Wall Street Journal finds that "a substantial part" of executive pay is now tied to <highlight>performance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《华尔街日报》最近对CEO薪酬的调查发现，高管薪酬中“很大一部分”现在与业绩挂钩。

examination_example.sentence: The program keeps track of your progress and provides detailed feedback on your <highlight>performance</highlight> and improvement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个程序会跟踪你的进度，提供详细的反馈并改进性能。

sense_info_list.en: an act of staging or presenting a play, concert, or other form of entertainment

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>performance</highlight> was a creative call to action ahead of November's United Nations Climate Change Conference in Glasgow, UK.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这次表演在英国格拉斯哥举行11月的联合国气候变化大会前进行，是一次创造性的行动呼吁。

examination_example.sentence: Land Art was one of a range of new forms, including Body Art, <highlight>Performance</highlight> Art, Action Art and Installation Art.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 地景艺术作为新形式的一种，包括人体艺术、表演艺术、行为艺术和装饰艺术在内。

examination_example.sentence: I find courage an essential quality for the understanding, let alone the <highlight>performance</highlight>, of his works.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我发现勇气是理解他的作品必不可少的品质，更不用说表演他的作品了。

sense_info_list.en: the action or process of carrying out or accomplishing an action, task, or function
an act that involves a lot of effort or trouble, sometimes when it is not necessary

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 性质, 状况

exam_freq_info.chinese: 夸张的行为; 过分的行为

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 执行者；演员；表演者；演奏者；演出者
n. 演出；表演；履行；执行；完成；表现；饰演；工作情况；言语行为；性能
v. 做得比…好；比…回报更高

word_family.mean: v. 执行；完成；实施；履行；演出；表演；工作；表现；运行

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 学术成就；学习成绩；学业表现

sense_info_list.en: an action, task, or operation, seen in terms of how successfully it was performed

examination_example.sentence: College professors are increasingly raisin go alarm bells about the effects smart phones, laptops, and tablets have on academic <highlight>performance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大学教授越来越多地对智能手机，笔记本电脑和平板电脑对学习成绩的影响提出警告。

examination_example.sentence: The Jones-Klenow measure can also assess an economy's <highlight>performance</highlight> over time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 琼斯-克莱诺指标也可以评估一个经济体在一段时间内的表现。

examination_example.sentence: The company blamed much of the poor <highlight>performance</highlight> in November and December on unseasonably warm weather.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该公司将11月和12月的糟糕表现归咎于异常温暖的天气。

sense_info_list.en: an act of staging or presenting a play, concert, or other form of entertainment

examination_example.sentence: Keep a record of their <highlight>performance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 记录他们的表现。

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>performance</highlight> is a lot more than a physical resemblance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 表演不仅仅是外形上的相似。

examination_example.sentence: It sets such an awful precedent for the future of <highlight>performance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它为未来的表现树立了一个如此糟糕的先例。

sense_info_list.en: the extent to which an investment is profitable, especially in relation to other investments

examination_example.sentence: The voice actors are pushing for the idea of secondary compensation-a <highlight>performance</highlight> bonus every time a game sells 2 million copies or downloads.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 配音演员正在倡导二次补偿的概念——每当游戏销售200万份或下载量就可获得绩效奖金。

sense_info_list.en: the capabilities of a machine, vehicle, or product, especially when observed under particular conditions
a display of exaggerated behavior or a process involving a great deal of unnecessary time and effort
sense_info_list.zh: 夸张的行为; 过分的行为

sense_info_list.en: the action or process of carrying out or accomplishing an action, task, or function

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 性质, 状况

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 学术成就；学习成绩；学业表现

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 执行者；演员；表演者；演奏者；演出者
n. 演出；表演；履行；执行；完成；表现；饰演；工作情况；言语行为；性能
v. 做得比…好；比…回报更高

word_family.mean: v. 执行；完成；实施；履行；演出；表演；工作；表现；运行

sense_info_list.en: an action; task; or operation; seen in terms of how successfully it was performed

examination_example.sentence: According to one study, students' academic <highlight>performance</highlight> is not the only decisive factor of their stress responses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据一项研究，学生的学习成绩并不是他们压力反应的唯一决定性因素。

examination_example.sentence: But in the long term their <highlight>performance</highlight> is negatively affected.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但从长远来看，他们的表现会受到负面影响。

examination_example.sentence: Consider that nearly two-thirds of students will experience the "ninth-grade shock," which refers to a dramatic drop in a student's academic <highlight>performance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考虑一下，将近三分之二的学生会经历“九年级休克”，这是指学生的学习成绩急剧下降。

sense_info_list.en: the extent to which an investment is profitable; especially in relation to other investments

examination_example.sentence: He followed various measures of <highlight>performance</highlight> over the next decade.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在接下来的十年里，他跟踪了各种各样的业绩指标。

examination_example.sentence: Nowadays you can't buy anything without then being asked to provide a rating of a company's <highlight>performance</highlight> on a five-star scale.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，如果不被要求提供一个五星等级的公司业绩评级，你就什么也买不到。

examination_example.sentence: Suffering early setbacks might help people improve their job <highlight>performance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 遭受早期挫折可能有助于人们提高工作绩效。

sense_info_list.en: the capabilities of a machine; vehicle; or product; especially when observed under particular conditions

examination_example.sentence: To make sure this wasn't by chance, Wang conducted additional tests using different <highlight>performance</highlight> measures.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了确保这不是偶然，王教授用不同的衡量方法进行了额外的测试。

sense_info_list.en: an act of staging or presenting a play; concert; or other form of entertainment

examination_example.sentence: He gave a <highlight>performance</highlight> in the auditorium.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在礼堂进行了一场表演。

sense_info_list.en: the action or process of carrying out or accomplishing an action; task; or function

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 性质, 状况

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 学术成就；学习成绩；学业表现

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 执行者；演员；表演者；演奏者；演出者

v. 做得比…好；比…回报更高

word_family.mean: v. 执行；完成；实施；履行；演出；表演；工作；表现；运行

sense_info_list.en: an act of staging or presenting a play, concert, or other form of entertainment

examination_example.sentence: And just in time for the trial <highlight>performance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正好赶上试唱。

examination_example.sentence: I found myself increasingly unwilling to drag myself to dance <highlight>performances</highlight>, so I quit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我发现自己越来越不愿意强迫自己去参加舞蹈演出，所以我辞职了。

examination_example.sentence: It promotes their academic <highlight>performance</highlight> and emotional growth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它促进了他们的学业表现和情感成长。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 精彩的表现；精彩的表演；卓越绩效

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 执行者；演员；表演者；演奏者；演出者
n. 演出；表演；履行；执行；完成；表现；饰演；工作情况；言语行为；性能

word_family.mean: v. 执行；完成；实施；履行；演出；表演；工作；表现；运行

examination_example.sentence: Monica’s successful <highlight>performance</highlight> brought everyone a great surprise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莫妮卡成功的表演给大家带来了很大的惊喜。

examination_example.sentence: Finally, I offered a full <highlight>performance</highlight> in front of the audience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，我在观众面前做了一场完整的表演。

examination_example.sentence: Everyone loved his <highlight>performance</highlight>, and he won the first prize!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人都喜欢他的表演，他获得了一等奖！

examination_example.sentence: We also need to know what other people think about our <highlight>performance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们还需要知道其他人对我们的表现有什么看法。

examination_example.sentence: And his <highlight>performance</highlight> on the court caused excitement and got much attention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以及他在球场上的表现引起了人们的兴奋和关注。

examination_example.sentence: The Polish man was crazy about the <highlight>performances</highlight> of the young team．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位波兰人对这支年轻球队的表现非常着迷。
